data.text: @LibDems They won’t be free, they will be paid for by UK tax payers. Happy to support this but like the #NHS it’s not free it costs a blinking fortune and it’s paid for from tax.
@LibDems Give us the PAID jobs we deserve, US sponsorship and compensation to #injustice #fraud #investmentscams no #Political  parties have a clue https://t.co/InEsuDIHsw

@LibDems They all need to be removed from public service, as far removed as their minds are! I'm sick of the greed, corruption, death and the disregard for regular people who just need some support in helping to live
